DOC.brief_summary: Probiotics and fruit fibre are given for 12 weeks to patients with fatty liver disease. The hypothesis is that probiotic bacteria and fruit fibre affect the gut microbial composition in a positive manner. The improved ecological system is believed to contribute to improved liver health and thereby counteract fatty liver disease.
DOC.brief_title: Supplementation of Probiotics and Fruit Fibre to Patients With Fatty Liver
